段: 倫敦是天下上第一大 e5京城，城內 e5 百姓亦cham2然艱苦 e5 輩；所以國家出tui3人民e5意思有設公醫院幾若百間，thang利益chhiN慘 e5 人。逐間病院也有看護婦teh管顧。Koh另外有已經卒業e5 看護婦，tiam3 hia 便便，出在院長派伊去有錢人in 兜，來幫助破病e5 人。

Lun5-tun si7 thiN-e7 siang7 te7-it toa7 e5 kiaN-siaN5, siaN5-lai7 e5 peh-siN3 iah8 cham2-jian5 kan-khou2 e5 poe3; sou2-i2 kok-ka chhut tui3 jin5-bin5 e5 i3-su3 u7 siat kong i-iN7 kui2-na7 pah keng, thang li7-ek chhiN-chham2 e5 lang5. Tak8 keng piN7-iN7 ia7 u7 khan3-hou7-hu7 teh koan2-kou3. Koh leng7-goa7 u7 i2-keng chut-giap8 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7, tiam3 hia pian7-pian7, chhut-chai7 iN7-tiuN2 phai3 i khi3 u7 chiN5 lang5 in tau, lai5 pang-chou7 phoa3-piN7 e5 lang5.
某日有一個看護婦倒轉來公醫院，身軀真厭sian7,因為一禮拜久伊暝--時teh顧病人。
Bou2 jit8 u7 chit8 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7 to3-tng2 lai5 kong i-iN7, seng-khu chin ia3-sian7, in-ui7 chit8 le2-pai3 ku2 i mi5--si5 teh kou3 peN7 lang5.
Tu2才倒來心teh想，「今無代誌lah，我beh 洗浴，後來出在我去睏到飽眠。」無扑算院長已經派伊即時著liam5-piN 出城外去較遠e5 所在。聽見伊e5 聲teh叫，心真鬱卒，不過m7 敢違keh，到伊e5 面前反轉那準有歡喜 e5 款式。院長ka7伊講，iau2有半點鐘久na7-tiaN7，著緊去款行李便，才會赴6點半hit 班e5火車。

Tu2 chiah to3--lai5 sim teh siuN7,“TaN bo5 tai7-chi3 lah, goa2 beh se2-ek8, au7-lai5 chhut-chai7 goa2 khi3 khun3 kau3 pa2 bin5.”Bo5 phah-sng3 iN7-tiuN2 i2-keng phai3 i chek-si5 tioh8 liam5-piN chhut siaN5-goa7 khi3 khah hng7 e5 sou2-chai7. ThiaN-kiN3 i e5 siaN teh kio3, sim chin ut-chut, put-ko3 m7 kaN2 ui5-keh, kau3 i e5 bin7-cheng5 hoan2-tng2 na2-chun2 u7 hoaN-hi2 e5 khoan2-sit. iN7-tiuN2 ka7 i kong2, iau2 u7 poaN3 tiam2-cheng ku2 na7-tiaN7, tioh8 kin2 khi3 khoan2 heng5-li2 pian7, chiah e7 hu3 lak8 tiam2 poaN3 hit pang e5 hoe2-chhia.
到某所在你著chhoe7某mih8牧師，因為是beh 顧伊e5 後生。Hit個囡仔差不多9歲，有染著腦chek-kin e5 病，致到定定倒teh攏be7行。

Kau3 bou2 sou2-chai7 li2 tioh8 chhoe7 bou2-mih8 bok8-su, in-ui7 si7 beh kou3 i e5 hau7-siN. Hit e5 gin2-na2 chha-put-to kau2 hoe3, u7 jiam2 tioh8 nau2-chek-kin e5 piN7, ti3-kau3 tiaN7-tiaN7 to2--teh long2 be7 kiaN5.
講了看護婦就去備辦，到火車內，人真sian7愛睏。火車beh 停睏伊忽然醒，知今到位lah﹗趕緊落車四界看有人來接接伊抑無，總--是無半個，就發落行李，倩一張馬車載伊到hit e5 牧師e5 厝。

Kong2-liau2 khan3-hou7-hu7 chiu7 khi3 pi7-pan7, kau3 hoe2-chhia-lai7, lang5 chin sian7 ai3 khun3. Hoe2-chhia beh theng5-khun3 i hut-jian5 chhiN2, chai taN kau3 ui7 lah! KoaN2-kin2 loh8 chhia si3-koe3 khoaN3 u7 lang5 lai5 chih-chiap i a2-bo5, chong2--si7 bo5 poaN3 e5, chiu7 hoat8-loh8 heng5-li2, chhiaN3 chit8 tiuN be2-chhia chai3 i kau3 hit e5 bok8-su e5 chhu3.
到位就扑門liam5-piN有一個老婦人人來開，叫伊入去坐，續ka7伊講牧師娘已經死幾若冬只有老父kap 孤單e5子，二人na7-tiaN7，亦伊本身替in teh料理家內 e5 事。

Kau3 ui7 chiu7 phah mng5 liam5-piN u7 chit8 e5 lau7 hu7-jin5-lang5 lai5 khui, kio3 i jip8 khi3 che7, soa3 ka7 i kong2 bok8-su-niu5 i2-keng si2 kui2-na7 tang chi2-u7 lau7-pe7 kap kou-toaN e5 kiaN2, nng7 lang5 na7-tiaN7, iah8 i pun2-sin the3 in teh liau7-li2 ke-lai7 e5 su7.
行李款入來明白，就牽伊入一間廳，ti7 hia有備辦e5昏頓。食飽人較爽快，今ai3去chhoe7所beh顧e5 囡仔。到樓頂，看護婦一下扑門；內面 e5 人無聽伊e5 腳步聲，所以開門hit-tiap8,in攏無越頭。

Heng5-li2 khoan2 jip8 lai5 beng5-pek8, chiu7 khan i jip8 chit8 keng thiaN, ti7 hia u7 pi7-pan7 e5-hng tng3. Chiah8-pa2 lang5 khah song2-khoai3, taN ai3 khi3 chhoe7 sou2 beh kou3 e5 gin2-na2. Kau3 lau5-teng2, khan3-hou7-hu7 chit8 e7 phah-mng5; lai7-bin7 e5 lang5 bo5 thiaN i e5 kha-pou7 siaN, sou2-i2 khui mng5 hit-tiap8, in long2 bo5 oat8-thau5.
Ti7 房內所看見e5，到一世人m7 ai3 be7記tit。Hit個囡仔倒ti7 the椅，伊e5 頭殼倚老父 e5 胸前，兩個做伙相kap談論，那親像不止相疼痛e5 款式。子tu2好teh問一句講，阿爸，王bat行錯抑m7 bat？

Ti7 pang5-lai7 sou2 khoaN3--kiN3-e5, kau3 chit8-si3-lang5 m7 ai3 be7-ki3-tit. Hit e5 gin2-na2 to2 ti7 the-i2, i e5 thau5-khak oa2 lau7-pe7 e5 heng-cheng5, nng7 e5 cho3-hoe2 saN-kap tam5-lun7, na2 chhin-chhiuN7 put-chi2 saN thiaN3-thang3 e5 khoan2-sit. KiaN2 tu2-ho2 teh mng7 chit8 ku3 kong2, A-pa, Ong5 bat kiaN5 chho3 a2 m7 bat?
老父應伊講，「我心肝子ah，王斷然m7 bat錯」。
Lau7-pe7 in3 i kong2,“Goa2 sim-koaN kiaN2 ah, Ong5 toan7-jian5 m7 bat chho3”.
Tu2 hit時in知影有人ti7 身邊，牧師liam5-piN 起來真好禮接接伊講，「看護先你來，路nih8有攏平安無？」即時就tui3伊e5子講，「Lo5-ni，che是 beh照顧你e5好朋友，今伊來lah，你較有伴，免得親像前日家己一人na7-tiaN7。」

Tu2 hit-si5 in chai-iaN2 u7 lang5 ti7 sin-piN, bok8-su liam5-piN khi2--lai5 chin ho2-le2 chih-chiap i kong2,“Khan3-hou7-sian li2 lai5, lou7--nih8 u7 long2 peng5-an bo5?”Chek-si5 chiu7 tui3 i e5 kiaN2 kong2,“Lo5-ni, che si7 beh chiau3-kou3 li2 e5 ho2 peng5-iu2, taN i lai5 lah, li2 khah u7 phoaN7, bian2-tit chhin-chhiuN7 cheng5 jit8 ka-ti7 chit8 lang5 na7-tiaN7.”
Lo5-ni 越過來看，目珠亦金金相伊，就伸一支真消瘦e5 手出來講，「真多謝你e5 好意，大向望我無費神你到siuN過頭。」

Lo5-ni oat8 koe3 lai5 khoaN3, bak8-chiu iah8 kim-kim siong3 i, chiu7 chhun chit8 ki chin siau-san2 e5 chhiu2 chhut lai5 kong2,“Chin to-sia7 li2 e5 ho2-i3, toa7 ng3-bang7 goa2 bo5 hui3-sin5 li2 kau3 siuN koe3-thau5.”
看護婦聽hit句，心肝有受大感激，一下跪落 ti7伊e5身邊，loah8伊e5 手，續應伊講：「Lo5-ni，我也teh 向望咱會相疼若朋友一樣。我著就本份管顧你；願所用e5 方法會大應效。」囡仔koh應講，「我知你是王所奉差--e5,an2-ni 我的確會真疼你。」

Khan3-hou7-hu7 thiaN hit ku3, sim-koaN u7 siu7 toa7 kam2-kek, chit8-e7 kui7 loh8 ti7 i e5 sin-piN, loah8 i e5 chhiu2, soa3 in3 i kong2,“Lo5-ni, goa2 ia7 teh ng3-bang7 lan2 e7 saN-thiaN3 na2 peng5-iu2 chit8-iuN7. Goa2 tioh8 chiu7 pun2-hun7 koan2-kou3 li2; goan7 sou2 eng7 e5 hong-hoat e7 toa7 eng3-hau7.”Gin2-na2 koh in3 kong2,“Goa2 chai li2 si7 Ong5 sou2 hong7-chhe--e5, an2-ni goa2 tek-khak e7 chin thiaN3 li2.”
聽伊teh 念，你是王所奉差hit句，心肝大奇，又koh問伊，「Hit句e5 意義著講較明因為我be7 曉聽。」
ThiaN i teh liam7, Li2 si7 Ong5 sou2 hong7-chhe hit ku3, sim-koaN toa7 ki5, iu7 koh mng7 i,“Hit ku3 e5 i3-gi7 tioh8 kong2 khah beng5 in-ui7 goa2 be7 hiau2 thiaN.”
Lo5-ni liam5-piN 開聲應講，「Hit 個意思真白。Tui3醫生吩咐我老父著請一個看護婦，阮直直祈禱，求王設法，備辦tu2好 e5 人來chia，所以知kioh你是伊所差遣--e5。」Lo5-ni 講，「看護先你 e5 名是叫甚物？」

Lo5-ni liam5-piN khui siaN in3 kong2,“Hit e5 i3-su3 chin peh8. Tui3 I-seng hoan-hu3 goa2 lau7-pe7 tioh8 chhiaN2 chit8 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7, goan2 tit8-tit8 ki5-to2, kiu5 Ong5 siat-hoat, pi7-pan7 tu2-ho2 e5 lang5 lai5 chia, sou2-i2 chai-kioh li2 si7 I sou2 chhe-khian2--e5.”Lo5-ni kong2, “Khan3-hou7-sian li2 e5 mia5 si7 kio3 sim2-mih8?”
伊就應講，「我e5 名姓是連歡喜。」囡仔tui3伊e5 老父講，「阿爸，連歡喜hit 個名字，敢m7是好聽？王所差e5 看護婦我真意愛伊」。

I chiu7 in3 kong2,“Goa2 e5 mia5-siN3 si7 Lian5 HoaN-hi2.”Gin2-na2 tui3 i e5 lau7-pe7 kong2,“A-pa, Lian5 HoaN-hi2 hit e5 mia5-ji7, kiam2 m7 si7 ho2 thiaN? Ong5 sou2 chhe e5 khan3-hou7-hu7 goa2 chin i3-ai3 i”.
到這時老父kah伊m7-thang講話傷濟，因為已經暗，身體也iau2真軟弱，驚了明仔再較厭sian7。老父就倚伊身邊beh抱伊到房間，囡仔出聲講，「阿爸咱著代先ka7 阿娘安眠。」Lo5-ni不時大數念伊e5 老母，那準伊iau2-ku2 kap in做伙ti7--teh，就提伊e5相ti7 手nih8,ka7伊chim一擺，才ka7伊e5 老父講，「阿爸，我攏便，今來去睏。」

Kau3 chit-si5 lau7-pe7 kah i m7-thang kong2 oe7 siuN che7, in-ui7 i2-keng am3, sin-the2 ia7 iau2 chin loan2-jiok8, kiaN-liau2 bin5-a2-chai3 khah ia3-sian7. Lau7-pe7 chiu7 oa2 i sin-piN beh pho7 i kau3 pang5-keng, gin2-na2 chhut-siaN kong2,“A-pa lan2 tioh8 tai7-seng ka7 an2-nia5 an-bin5.”Lo5-ni put-si5 toa7 siau3-liam7 i e5 lau7-bo2, na2-chun2 i iau2-ku2 kap in cho3-hoe2 ti7--teh, chiu7 theh8 i e5 siong7 ti7 chhiu2--nih8, ka7 i chim chit8 pai2, chiah ka7 i e5 lau7-pe7 kong2,“A-pa, goa2 long2 pian7, taN lai5 khi3 khun3.”
連歡喜 beh去睏 e5 時，ti7房間內be7免tit思想hit日所歷過 e5 事，心肝也teh想，Lo5-ni所講hit一句，「王攏m7 bat錯誤，阮祈禱伊差你來，kam2 m7是好？」那想那見笑，因為從前伊kap伊e5 父母是拜上帝 e5 人，今到現今知伊本身是冷淡，ai3家己主意，m7 肯歸服救主。

Lian5 HoaN-hi2 beh khi3 khun3 e5 si5, ti7 pang5-keng-lai7 be7 bian2-tit su-siuN2 hit jit8 sou2 lek8--koe3 e5 su7, sim-koaN ia7 teh siuN7, Lo5-ni sou2 kong2 hit chit8 ku3,“Ong5 long2 m7 bat chho3-gou7, goan2 ki5-to2 I chhe li2 lai5, kam2 m7 si7 ho2?”Na2 siuN7 na2 kian3-siau3, in-ui7 chiong5-cheng5 i kap i e5 pe7-bo2 si7 pai3 Siong7-te3 e5 lang5, taN kau3 hian7-kim chai i pun2-sin si7 leng2-tam7, ai3 ka-ti7 chu2-i3, m7 kheng2 kui-hok8 Kiu3-chu2.
來toa3牧師in 兜，pou7-pin5看Lo5-ni e5 款，真正疼耶穌那親像認伊做親密e5 朋友，實在有刺chhak8伊e5心，愈久愈煩惱。心肝那忍neh，驚了恩典 e5 時已經過身，無路thang chhoe7主。Koh心內常常有聽見Lo5-ni e5聲teh念hit句，「你是王e5 看護婦。」這號聲kaN2是聖神beh扑醒伊e5 良心。

Lai5 toa3 Bok8-su in tau, pou7-pin5 khoaN3 Lo5-ni e5 khoan2, chin-chiaN3 thiaN3 Ia5-sou na2 chhin-chhiuN7 jin7 I cho3 chhin-bit8 e5 peng5-iu2, sit8-chai7 u7 chhi3-chhak8 i e5 sim, ju2 ku2 ju2 hoan5-lo2. Sim-koaN na2 lun2-neh, kiaN-liau2 in-tian2 e5 si5 i2-keng koe3-sin, bo5 lou7 thang chhoe7 Chu2. Koh sim-lai7 siong5-siong5 u7 thiaN-kiN3 Lo5-ni e5 siaN teh liam7 hit ku3,“Li2 si7 Ong5 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7.”Chit ho7 siaN kaN2 si7 Seng3-sin5 beh phah chhiN2 i e5 liong5-sim.
今tiam3牧師 e5 厝幾若禮拜，連歡喜愈久愈疼hit 個囡仔，日日kap伊交陪，be7免tit欣慕，ai3做親像伊，因為Lo5-ni 卻是深信 e5 囡仔，不時看耶穌那準ti7伊身邊，也看天堂那近父。Bat一日伊kap Lo5-ni ti7 走尾樓teh坐，忽然間hit個囡仔舉頭講，「看護先，你kiam2無ai3王tu2這時來chia kap咱相kap講話，看伊若見你一樣？」

TaN tiam3 Bok8-su e5 chhu3 kui2-na7 le2-pai3, Lian5 HoaN-hi2 ju2 ku2 ju2 thiaN3 hit e5 gin2-na2, jit8-jit8 kap i kau-poe5, be7-bian2-tit him-bou7, ai3 cho3 chhin-chhiuN7 i, in-ui7 Lo5-ni khiok si7 chhim-sin3 e5 gin2-na2, put-si5 khoaN3 Ia5-sou na2 chun2 ti7 i sin-piN, ia7 khoaN3 Thian-tong5 na2 kin7-hu7. Bat chit8 jit8 i kap Lo5-ni ti7 chau2-be2-lau5 teh che7, hut-jian5-kan hit e5 gin2-na2 kiah8 thau5 kong2,“Khan3-hou7-sian, li2 kiam2 bo5 ai3 Ong5 tu2 chit si5 lai5 chia kap lan2 saN-kap kong2 oe7, khoaN3 I na2 kiN3 li2 chit8-iuN7?”
看護婦m7 敢應伊，kan-ta講，「我無啥知。」就問伊講，「你本身扑算an2-chaiN2樣？」
Khan3-hou7-hu7 m7 kaN2 in3 i, kan-ta kong2,“Goa2 bo5 siaN2 chai.” Chiu7 mng7 i kong2,“Li2 pun2-sin phah-sng3 an2-chaiN2-iuN7?”

Lo5-ni e5 面貌kai3歡喜，就liam5-piN應講，「自然我e5 心大意愛，tui3久久真欣慕beh 見著王e5 面，續beh ka7伊說謝因為差你來顧我。」看護婦應伊講，「我所疼 e5 Lo5-ni，你講hit句我盡在歡喜。」Koh問伊一擺，意思是beh試看囡仔 e5 心，就講，「設使王hit時有差一個歹性地，無合你 e5所愛--e5 顧你。你會giau5疑抑be7?」Lo5-ni 應講，「我決斷無giau5疑。若是不得已tu2著hit等號e5 來，kaN2是主e5好意思，beh hou7伊ti7 chia受著利益，續信耶穌來得救。有時我e5王bat將小可 e5 事託重我替伊做。阿爸bat講，跛腳--e5所行做，無的確是勇健 e5 人。聽著阮父講an2-ni，我大歡喜，知有路thang做干證，我是真疼王e5 囡仔。」看護婦聽伊所念 e5 話了，忽然間流目屎講，「Lo5-ni 我扑算你 e5 王果然託重你一項。」

Lo5-ni e5 bin7-mau7 kai3 hoaN-hi2, chiu7 liam5-piN in3 kong2,“Chu7-jian5 goa2 e5 sim toa7 i3-ai3, tui3 ku2-ku2 chin him-bou7 beh kiN3 tioh8 Ong5 e5 bin7, soa3 beh ka7 I seh-sia7 in-ui7 chhe li2 lai5 kou3 goa2.”Khan3-hou7-hu7 in3 i kong2,“Goa2 sou2 thiaN3 e5 Lo5-ni, li2 kong2 hit ku3 goa2 chin7-chai7 hoaN-hi2.”Koh mng7 i chit8 pai2, i3-su3 si7 beh chhi3 khoaN3 gin2-na2 e5 sim, chiu7 kong2,“Siat-su2 Ong5 hit-si5 u7 chhe chit8 e5 phaiN2 seng3-te7, bo5 hah8 li2 e5 sou2 ai3--e5 kou3--li2. Li2 e7 giau5-gi5 a2-be7?”Lo5-ni in3 kong2,“Goa2 koat-toan3 bo5 giau5-gi5. Na7 si7 put-tek-i2 tu2 tioh8 hit teng2-ho7--e5 lai5, kaN2 si7 Chu2 e5 ho2 i3-su3, beh hou7 i ti7 chia siu7 tioh8 li7-ek, soa3 sin3 Ia5-sou lai5 tit kiu3. U7-si5 goa2 e5 Ong5 bat chiong sio2-khoa2 e5 su7 thok-tiong7 goa2 the3 I cho3. A-pa bat kong2, Pai2-kha--e5 sou2 kiaN5-cho3, bo5 tek-khak si7 iong2-kiaN7 e5 lang5. ThiaN tioh8 goan2 pe7 kong2 an2-ni, goa2 toa7 hoaN-hi2, chai u7 lou7 thang cho3 kan-cheng3, goa2 si7 chin thiaN3 Ong5 e5 gin2-na2.”Khan3-hou7-hu7 thiaN i sou2 liam7 e5 oe7 liau2, hut-jian5-kan lau5 bak8-sai2 kong2,“Lo5-ni goa2 phah-sng3 li2 e5 Ong5 ko2-jian5 thok-tiong7 li2 chit8 hang7.”
囡仔應講，「有影無？是甚物代誌？」連歡喜近倚來Lo5-ni e5 身邊講，「幾若年前我猶原疼你 e5 王，後--來勻勻仔冷淡，到現時有扑失落伊e5 恩，今是beh你贊我koh chhoe7伊，kap伊親近。」

Gin2-na2 in3 kong2,“U7 iaN2 bo5? Si7 sim2-mih8 tai7-chi3?”Lian5 HoaN-hi2 kun7-oa2 lai5 Lo5-ni e5 sin-piN kong2,“Kui2-na7 ni5 cheng5 goa2 iu5-goan5 thiaN3 li2 e5 Ong5, au7--lai5 un5-un5-a2 leng2-tam7, kau3 hian7-si5 u7 phah-sit-loh8 I e5 in, taN si7 beh li2 chan7 goa2 koh chhoe7 I, kap I chhin-kun7.”
Lo5-ni 注目看伊，才講，「我聽無明，你若是王所奉差--e5 可見有疼伊。」就應伊講，「Lo5-ni我真正ai3,不過m7知這時伊beh疼我無？」

Lo5-ni chu3-bak8 khoaN3 i, chiah kong2,“Goa2 thiaN bo5 beng5, li2 na7 si7 Ong5 sou2 hong7-chhe--e5 kho2-kian3 u7 thiaN3 I.” Chiu7 in3 i kong2,“Lo5-ni goa2 chin-chiaN3 ai3, put-ko3 m7 chai chit-si5 I beh thiaN3 goa2 bo5?”
囡仔應講，「咱這tiap8著來問伊」。目珠就放kheh開聲講，「所疼 e5 主耶穌，要緊beh求一項。因為我e5看護婦chiah久仔be7記tit你，今ai3 倒轉來chhoe7你。我是無智識e5 囡仔，be7曉求較濟，總--是知影你攏m7 bat be7記tit伊。今祈求你施恩牽救伊。所祈禱是靠耶穌；心所願。」

Gin2-na2 in3 kong2,“Lan2 chit-tiap8 tioh8 lai5 mng7 I”. Bak8-chiu chiu7 pang3-kheh khui siaN kong2,“Sou2 thiaN3 e5 Chu2 Ia5-sou, iau3-kin2 beh kiu5 chit8 hang7. In-ui7 goa2 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7 chiah-ku2-a2 be7-ki3-tit Li2, taN ai3 to3-tng2 lai5 chhoe7 Li2. Goa2 si7 bo5 ti3-sek e5 gin2-na2, be7 hiau2 kiu5 khah che7, chong2--si7 chai-iaN2 Li2 long2 m7 bat be7-ki3-tit i. TaN ki5-kiu5 Li2 si-in khan-kiu3 i. Sou2 ki5-to2 si7 kho3 Ia5-sou; Sim sou2 goan7.”
Lo5-ni今較無掛慮，因為已經ka7主講lah﹗連歡喜也那欣soan7 ai3做王真實e5看護婦。看見Lo5-ni kap伊e5老父所顯出 e5 仁愛，第一thang感激人 e5 心，因為in e5 相疼是真非常，罕得tu2--著-e5,真正m7是平常 e5 款式。

Lo5-ni taN khah bo5 khoa3-lu7, in-ui7 i2-keng ka7 Chu2 kong2 lah! Lian5 HoaN-hi2 ia7 na2 him-soan7 ai3 cho3 Ong5 chin-sit8 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7. KhoaN3-kiN3 Lo5-ni kap i e5 lau7-pe7 sou2 hian2-chhut e5 jin5-ai3, te7-it thang kam2-kek lang5 e5 sim, in-ui7 in e5 saN-thiaN3 si7 chin hui-siong5, han2-tit tu2--tioh8-e5, chin-chiaN3 m7 si7 peng5-siong5 e5 khoan2-sit.
看護婦若去行遊倒來，常常看見Lo5-ni e5 身chhek倚老父，用頭殼掛ti7伊e5肩頭，兩個相牽手。有時攏無講半句，koh有時用細仔聲teh思量，面貌歡喜真親切 e5 款。

Khan3-hou7-hu7 na7 khi3 kiaN5-iu5 to3--lai5, siong5-siong5 khoaN3-kiN3 Lo5-ni e5 sin chhek-oa2 lau7-pe7, eng7 thau5-khak khoa3 ti7 i e5 keng-thau5, nng7 e5 saN-khan chhiu2. U7-si5 long2 bo5 kong2 poaN3-ku3, koh u7-si5 eng7 se3-a2-siaN teh su-niu5, bin7-mau7 hoaN-hi2 chin chhin-chhiat e5 khoan2.
Hit時知影in有數念所疼e5 老母。Lo5-ni 不時愛講起伊iau2活e5 時所經過 e5 事。Be7免tit奇怪hit個囡仔gau5記心到an2-ni，常想伊ti7 天堂那看現現一樣。

Hit-si5 chai-iaN2 in u7 siau3-liam7 sou2 thiaN3 e5 lau7-bo2. Lo5-ni put-si5 ai3 kong2-khi2 i iau2 oah8 e5 si5 sou2 keng-koe3 e5 su7. Be7 bian2-tit ki5-koai3 hit e5 gin2-na2 gau5 ki3-sim kau3 an2-ni, siong5-siuN7 i ti7 Thian-tong5 na2 khoaN3 hian7-hian7 chit8-iuN7.
頭一擺念伊老母e5 代誌，就問伊講，「Lo5-ni，你e5 老母kap lin2 相離別有幾冬--lah？」
Thau5 chit8 pai2 liam7 i lau7-bo2 e5 tai7-chi3, chiu7 mng7 i kong2,“Lo5-ni, li2 e5 lau7-bo2 kap lin2 saN li7-piat8 u7 kui2 tang lah?”
伊應講，「是tui3我細漢e5 時。雖然伊e5 形象我略仔be7記tit，m7-ku2 阿爸tauh8-tauh8 將伊e5 話ka7我講，也有伊e5 像thang看；所以常常會記得。王召我e5 老母去e5 日，伊be7 推辭tit；今現時阿爸kap我較無伴，不得已著聽候王叫阮去 e5 日才會相見。」

I in3 kong2,“Si7 tui3 goa2 se3-han3 e5 si5. Sui-jian5 i e5 heng5-siong7 goa2 lioh8-a2 be7-ki3-tit, m7-ku2 a-pa tauh8-tauh8 chiong i e5 oe7 ka7 goa2 kong2, ia7 u7 i e5 siong7 thang khoaN3; sou2-i2 siong5-siong5 e7 ki3-tit. Ong5 tiau3 goa2 e5 lau7-bo2 khi3 e5 jit8, i be7 the-si5--tit; taN hian7-si5 a-pa kap goa2 khah bo5 phoaN7, put-tek-i2 tioh8 theng3-hau7 Ong5 kio3 goan2 khi3 e5 jit8 chiah e7 saN-kiN3.”
連歡喜應講，「Lo5-ni 你m7-thang 愛kap阮相辭。向望別日你 e5 身體會koh得著勇健。」
Lian5 HoaN-hi2 in3 kong2,“Lo5-ni li2 m7-thang ai3 kap goan2 saN-si5. Ng3-bang7 pat8 jit8 li2 e5 sin-the2 e7 koh tit tioh8 iong2-kiaN7.”
囡仔應講，「看護先，你 e5話kiam2-chhai2實，總--是我真愛見著我e5 王kap老母，只有一項，真愛阿爸一齊來去」。
Gin2-na2 in3 kong2,“Khan3-hou7-sian, li2 e5 oe7 kiam2-chhai2 sit8, chong2--si7 goa2 chin ai3 kiN3 tioh8 goa2 e5 Ong5 kap lau7-bo2, chi2-u7 chit8 hang7, chin ai3 a-pa chit8 che5 lai5 khi3”.
Hit-tiap8無扑算Lo5-ni e5 心所ai3 hiah緊beh成。過一禮拜伊有重感著肺管發炎。頭兩日 e5 中間病較輕，第3日就那沉重，那危險，m7敢向望伊會活。Hit暝老父kap看護婦直直相輪顧，老父常坐ti7伊身邊，m7肯離房間。

Hit-tiap8 bo5 phah-sng3 Lo5-ni e5 sim sou2 ai3 hiah kin2 beh chiaN5. Koe3 chit8 le2-pai3 i u7 teng5 kam2 tioh8 hi3-kng2 hoat-iam7. Thau5 nng7 jit8 e5 tiong-kan peN7 khah khin, te7 saN jit8 chiu7 na2 tim5-tang7, na2 gui5-hiam2, m7 kaN2 ng3-bang7 i e7 oah8. Hit me5 lau7-pe7 kap khan3-hou7-hu7 tit8-tit8 saN-lun5 kou3, lau7-pe7 siong5-che7 ti7 i sin-piN, m7 kheng2 li7 pang5-keng.
半暝後Lo5-ni 若無脈，扑算beh liam5-piN 去。總--是到三點鐘，伊略仔較 choah8 ，無hiah大喘，就叫in老父抱伊。牧師將一領毯仔ka7伊包好勢，才去坐ti7 火爐邊較燒e5 所在。Hit時吩咐看護婦著去歇睏tiap仔久。老父就在疼伊e5 子，看無法醫ta5-oa5,就煩惱到心肝beh 爆破。過一時仔久，連歡喜koh入來巡，知伊是無偌久人，老父猶原teh抱伊，攏無徙位。

PoaN3-me5-au7 Lo5-ni na2 bo5 meh8, phah-sng3 beh liam5-piN khi3. Chong2--si7 kau3 saN tiam2-cheng, i lioh8-a2 khah choah8, bo5 hiah toa7 chhoan2, chiu7 kio3 in lau7-pe7 pho7 i. Bok8-su chiong chit8 nia2 than2-a2 ka7 i pau ho2-se3, chiah khi3 che7 ti7 hoe2-lou5 piN khah sio e5 sou2-chai7. Hit-si5 hoan-hu3 khan3-hou7-hu7 tioh8 khi3 hioh-khun3 tiap-a2-ku2. Lau7-pe7 chiu7-chai7 thiaN3 i e5 kiaN2, khoaN3 bo5-hoat i ta5-oa5, chiu7 hoan5-lo2 kau3 sim-koaN beh piak-phoa3. Koe3 chit8-si5-a2-ku2, Lian5 hoaN-hi2 koh jip8 lai5 sun5, chai i si7 bo5 loa7 ku2 lang5, lau7-pe7 iu5-goan5 teh pho7 i, long2 bo5 soa2-ui7.

聽見看護婦 e5 聲，Lo5-ni teh振動來伸手。伊就跪ti7伊身邊，囡仔才用細仔聲念講，「阿爸tu2 teh報我知，今仔日kaN2是beh chhoa7 我e5 王kap老母。到天堂我beh 將你e5 代誌攏ka7 王講。看護先我ai3 koh 問你一項，你果然是王 e5 看護婦抑m7是？」 連歡喜應伊講，「所真疼e5 Lo5-ni 今仔日我講，我真正是王e5 看護婦。Che也是你所贊我才會得著。」

ThiaN-kiN3 khan3-hou7-hu7 e5 siaN, Lo5-ni teh tin2-tang7 lai5 chhun-chhiu2. I chiu7 kui7 ti7 i sin-piN, gin2-na2 chiah eng7 se3-a2 siaN liam7 kong2,“A-pa tu2 teh po3 goa2 chai, kin-a2-jit8 kaN2 si7 beh chhoa7 goa2 e5 Ong5 kap lau7-bo2. Kau3 Thian-tong5 goa2 beh chiong li2 e5 tai7-chi3 long2 ka7 Ong5 kong2. Khan3-hou7-sian goa2 ai3 koh mng7 li2 chit8 hang7, Li2 ko2-jian5 si7 Ong5 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7 a2 m7 si7?”Lian5 HoaN-hi2 in3 i kong2,“Sou2 chin thiaN3 e5 Lo5-ni kin-a2-jit8 goa2 kong2, goa2 chin-chiaN3 si7 Ong5 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7. Che ia7 si7 li2 sou2 chan7 goa2 chiah e7 tit--tioh8.”
囡仔koh 問，「你所講有影無？」
Gin2-na2 koh mng7,“Li2 sou2 kong2 u7-iaN2 bo5?”
連歡喜應講，「其實有影。」Lo5-ni 講，「若是an2-ni我就滿心歡喜。」囡仔才叫看護婦來chim伊。伊就liam5-piN aN3落ka7伊chim嘴。摸伊e5 身軀，hit-tiap8攏流凊汗。Lo5-ni 這時那無力，kan-ta 用細仔聲叫老父講，「阿爸我的確會記得你所託重我e5話。Ti7天堂我kap 阿娘beh聽候你來。你有歡喜緊來抑無？」

Lian5 HoaN-hi2 in3 kong2,“Ki5-sit8 u7 iaN2.”Lo5-ni kong2,“Na7 si7 an2-ni goa2 chiu7 moa2-sim hoaN-hi2.”Gin2-na2 chiah kio3 khan3-hou7-hu7 lai5 chim i. I chiu7 liam5-piN aN3 loh8 ka7 i chim-chhui3. Bong i e5 seng-khu, hit-tiap8 long2 lau5 chhin3-koaN7. Lo5-ni chit-si5 na2 bo5 lat8, kan-ta eng7 se3-a2 siaN kio3 lau7-pe7 kong2,“A-pa goa2 tek-khak e7-ki3-tit li2 sou2 thok-tiong7 goa2 e5 oe7. Ti7 Thian-tong5 goa2 kap an2-nia5 beh theng3-hau7 li2 lai5. Li2 u7 hoaN-hi2 kin2 lai5 a2-bo5?”
囡仔e5 目珠金金teh相老父 e5 面，若親像盡愛聽伊所beh應e5 話。
Gin2-na2 e5 bak8-chiu kim-kim teh siong3 lau7-pe7 e5 bin7, na2 chhin-chhiuN7 chin7 ai3 thiaN i sou2 beh in3 e5 oe7.
牧師即時應伊講，「我心肝子ah﹗王召e5 時到，我真甘願愛去。」Hit句tu2仔講了，Lo5-ni hou7主召伊去。老父就將伊e5 身屍下落眠床才講，「Lo5-ni 果然有到ti7 王 e5 位，已經有見著伊e5 面。」

Bok8-su chek-si5 in3 i kong2,“Goa2 sim-koaN-kiaN2 ah! Ong5 tiau3 e5 si5 kau3, goa2 chin kam-goan7 ai3 khi3.”Hit ku3 tu2-a2 kong2 liau2, Lo5-ni hou7 Chu2 tiau3 i khi3. Lau7-pe7 chiu7 chiong i e5 sin-si he7-loh8 bin5-chhng5 chiah kong2,“Lo5-ni ko2-jian5 u7 kau3 ti7 Ong5 e5 ui7, i2-keng u7 kiN3 tioh8 i e5 bin7.”
牧師一時仔久企teh看囡仔 e5 身屍，be7免得想伊所深疼 e5 子，今已經相離別，無thang koh 聽伊e5 聲。想了就擋be7-tiau5，做伊出去。

Bok8-su chit8-si5-a2 ku2 khia7 teh khoaN3 gin2-a2 e5 sin-si, be7-bian2-tit siuN7 i sou2 chhim-thiaN3 e5 kiaN2, taN i2-keng siong li7-piat8, bo5 thang koh thiaN i e5 siaN. SiuN7 liau2 chiu7 tong3-be7-tiau5, cho3 i chhut--khi3.
連歡喜洗身屍了，就跪落ti7 邊--仔，求上帝贊伊來學Lo5-ni e5 深信，續來toe3伊e5好模樣。Hit時也將本身一盡獻hou7 主，到一世人ai3 beh做王e5 看護婦。

Lian5 HoaN-hi2 se2 sin-si liau2, chiu7 kui7 loh8 ti7 piN--a2, kiu5 Siong7-te3 chan7 i lai5 oh8 Lo5-ni e5 chhim-sin3, soa3 lai5 toe3 i e5 ho2 bou5-iuN7. Hit-si5 ia7 chiong pun2-sin it-chin7 hian3 hou7 Chu2, kau3 chit8-si3-lang5 ai3 beh cho3 Ong5 e5 khan3-hou7-hu7.
